p: Each test solution (0.5 mL) was added to reaction mixture containing CuCl 2 (1 mL, 10 mM), neocuproine (1 mL, 7.5 mM), and NH 4Ac buffer (1 mL, 1 M, pH 7.0). Similarly, a blank was prepared using sample solution (0.5 mL) and reaction mixture (3 mL) without CuCl 2. The absorbances were read at 450 nm after 30 min of incubation at room temperature. Results are expressed as milligrams of trolox equivalent per gram of extract (TE/g extract) [ 22].
